name: FLARE
description:
'Flare' is part of the '360 senses' collection which is series of twelve hats inspired by Ancient Egyptian beliefs and spirituality.

A completely hand blocked, wired and stitched brimmed hat made from a gorgeous wool felt in burnt orange. It's trimmed with a deep mustard leather band and finished with a brass stud. 

The deep brim on this hat is wired so can be turned up, down or worn asymmetrically- whatever suits your mood! 

Lined in a contrasting silk and secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear.

Dimension/Size-
31cm's in diameter, 6.5cm's high. One size fits all.

name: GEOMETRIC HEX
description:
'Geometric Hex' is part of the '360 senses' collection which is series of twelve hats inspired by Ancient Egyptian beliefs and spirituality.

This hexagonal pillbox hat has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched. Made from a sturdy buckram base, its then covered in a charcoal and chartreuse knitted and felted lambswool in a triangular pattern.

Lined in a contrasting silk and secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear.

The fabric on this hat has been designed and produced by myself so is completely unique.

Dimension/Size-
9.5cm's in diameter, 2.5cm's high. One size fits all

name: GEODESIC
description:
'Geodesic' is part of the '360 senses' collection which is series of twelve hats inspired by Ancient Egyptian beliefs and spirituality.

A completely hand blocked and stitched mini capeline made from a gorgeous wool felt in rich brown. 
It's trimmed with a deep mustard leather band and finished with a brass stud. 

Lined in a contrasting silk and secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear.

Dimension/Size-
30cm's in diameter and 7.5cm's at highest point. One size fits all.

name: SPOT MINI FEZ
description:
'Spot Mini Fez' is part of the '360 senses' collection which is series of twelve hats inspired by Ancient Egyptian beliefs and spirituality.

This mini fez pillbox hat has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched. Made from a sturdy buckram base, its then covered in an orange and blue knitted and felted lambswool in a polkadot pattern.

Lined in a contrasting silk and secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear.

The fabric on this hat has been designed and produced by myself so is completely unique.

Dimension/Size-
11.5 cm's high, 5cm's at highest point. One size fits all.

name: AURIC MINI BOWLER
description:
'Auric Mini Bowler' is part of the '360 senses' collection which is series of twelve hats inspired by Ancient Egyptian beliefs and spirituality.

A completely hand blocked and stitched mini bowler made from a gorgeous wool felt in rich aubergine. It's trimmed with a metallic gold leather band and edged in the same metallic gold leather. 

Lined in a contrasting silk and secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear.

Dimension/Size-
18cm's in diameter, 7.5cm's high. One size fits all.

name: LIGHT
description:
'Light' is part of the '360 senses' collection which is series of twelve hats inspired by Ancient Egyptian beliefs and spirituality.

This dished pillbox hat has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched. 

Made from a sturdy buckram base, its then covered in a blue and ivory knitted fabric in a zig zag pattern. The blue yarns are 100% lambswool and the ivory yarns contain both lambswool and phosphorescent yarn. The phosphorescent yarn will charge in the day under sunlight, then glow of its own accord during the night, making a real conversation piece of a hat!

Lined in a contrasting silk and secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear.

The fabric on this hat has been designed and produced by myself so is completely unique.

Dimension/Size-
12cm's in diameter and 5cm's at highest point. One size fits all.

name: AMARNA
description:
'Amarna' is part of the '360 senses' collection which is series of twelve hats inspired by Ancient Egyptian beliefs and spirituality.

A completely hand blocked and stitched sloped crown mini hat made from a gorgeous wool felt in navy blue. 

It's trimmed with a vibrant coral leather band and lined in a contrasting silk. It's secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear.

Dimension/Size-
21cm's in diameter, 7cm's high. One size fits all

This mini beret has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched. Made from a sturdy buckram base, its then covered in an orange and blue knitted and felted lambswool in a linear pattern.

Lined in a contrasting silk and secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear.

The fabric on this hat has been designed and produced by myself so is completely unique.

A completely hand blocked and stitched mini cut out hat made from a gorgeous wool felt in turquoise. It's trimmed with a metallic gold leather band and edged in the same metallic gold leather. 

Lined in a contrasting silk and secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear.

Lined in a contrasting silk and secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear.

name: LUXOR
description:
'Luxor' is part of the '360 senses' collection which is series of twelve hats inspired by Ancient Egyptian beliefs and spirituality.

This triangular cutout pillbox hat has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched. 

Made from a tan wool felt base, its then covered in an exquisite multi directional sequinned lace which has been adorned with a mixture of Swarovski crystals and glass beads. Every crystal and bead has been individually hand stitched on to create this stunning piece.

Lined in a contrasting silk and secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear.

Dimension/Size-
11.5cm's in diameter, 9cm's at highest point. One size fits all.

name: Gift Voucher - £100.00
description:
Gift voucher for the value of £100 

The perfect gift for any hat lover. This voucher includes a full consultation either in person at the studio, or via phone or email. The lucky recipient can either design a bespoke hat or headpiece with AM Millinery, or they can order directly from this website. 

The gift vouchers are printed on luxe matt card and come wrapped in matching envelopes and ribbon.

name: Gift Voucher - £50.00
description:
Gift voucher for the value of £50 

The perfect gift for any hat lover. This voucher includes a full consultation either in person at the studio, or via phone or email. The lucky recipient can either design a bespoke hat or headpiece with AM Millinery, or they can order directly from this website.

name: SPOT BIBI
description:
This bibi (or mini beret) has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched. Made from a lightweight senimay base, it's then covered in a delicate polkadot silk chiffon in black and white. 
Finished with a polkadot bow with long tails and secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear.

Dimensions - 
14cm in diameter, one size fits all.
Bow tails measure 34cm's long.

Material Used - 
Senimay, silk chiffon

name: COMMA
description:
A hand blocked and wired headpiece in brass metal sequins. 

This headpiece has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched. Made from a sturdy buckram base, it's then covered in a hand stitched sequinned cotton. Each sequin has been painstakingly hand stitched on one by one. It's secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear. A simple yet striking piece.

Dimensions- 
24cm across, 9cm at widest point. One size fits all.

Materials Used - 
Buckram base, black cotton, brass loop sequins and marbled sequins.

name: POLKA PILLBOX
description:
A spotted little pillbox in black and ivory.

This pillbox has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched.Made from a lightweight senimay base, its then covered in a delicate silk chiffon in a black and ivory polkadot design and trimmed in a black senimay edging.
It's secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear and finished with a soft chiffon bow.

Dimensions - 
10.cm's in diameter. One size fits all.

Material Used - 
senimay, silk chiffon

name: DOTTED BOW BAND
description:
A cute little headpiece made from flock spotted tulle. 

This headpiece has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched. Made from a sturdy buckram base, it's then covered in a chartreuse cotton velvet, black polkadot tulle and trimmed with a chartreuse silk satin edging. 
Finished with a big tulle bow, it's secured to a black satin alice band making it very easy to wear. 

Dimensions - 
8cm x 17cm. One size fits all.

Material Used - 
buckram base, cotton velvet, silk satin, flocked tulle.

name: LOOP BIBI
description:
A striking silk mini beret embellished with multi coloured sequins.

This bibi (or mini beret) has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched. Made from a sturdy buckram base, it's then covered in a hand sequinned silk chiffon with gold loop sequins and iridescent green sequins. A grosgrain ribbon is attached which can be tied into a bow for an added detail.

It's lined in a complementing silk satin and is secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear. 

Dimensions - 
14cm's in diameter, one size fits all.

Material Used -
buckram base, sequinned silk chiffon, silk satin lining, grosgrain ribbon.

name: POLKA POM BAND
description:
A fun and colourful little veiled headpiece. 

Hand stitched using silk pompoms that have been hand made from teal silk chiffon and silver silk chiffon. Finished with fine French veiling in silver and attached to a black satin alice band making the piece very easy to wear.

Dimensions - 
Silver pompom measures 8cm's in diameter and teal pompom measures 5cm's. 
Veiling measures 16cm x 25 cm. 

One size fits all.

Material Used - 
Silk chiffon, French veiling.

name: STUDDED CASHMERE BERET
description:
This beret has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched. Made from a sturdy buckram base, its then covered in a gorgeously luxurious black cashmere wool. Oversized brass sequins have then been hand applied in a paisley pattern. Its lined in a contrasting hot pink silk and is secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear.

Size- One size fits all
Dimensions- 3cm's high, 18cm's in diameter.

name: TEAL FLORAL ZARI HEADBAND
description:
This headband has been hand stitched using a traditional Indian trimming. Embroidered with cotton threads, metal yarns, sequins and delicate wire springs. Its lined in a wool felt to prevent slipping and secured to the head with a grosgrain ribbon making it very easy to wear. The ribbon ends have also been hand beaded with glass beads in turquoise. 

Size- One size fits all
Dimensions- 30cm's x 6cm's

name: SILK BROCADE TURBAN HEADBAND IN COBALT BLUE
description:
This turban style head band has been hand stitched using a gorgeous Indian brocade made from silk and metal threads. It's attached to a black Alice band making it very easy to wear. Perfect if you are looking for a simple turban effect!

Size- One size fits all
Dimensions- 30cm's across

name: PLUM PILL
description:
This pillbox has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched.

Made from a sturdy buckram base, its then covered in a hand beaded silk chiffon using an assortment of beads and sequins. Its lined in a contrasting teal silk and is secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear.

Dimension/Size-
3cm high, 11cm diameter. One size fits all

name: SILK BROCADE TURBAN HEADBAND IN BLACK AND WHITE
description:
This turban style head band has been hand stitched using a gorgeous Indian brocade made from silk and metal threads. It's attached to a black Alice band making it very easy to wear. Perfect if you are looking for a simple turban effect!

Dimension/Size-
30cm's across. One size fits all.

name: STUDDED BIBI
description:

Its lined in a contrasting cobalt blue silk and is secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear.

Size- One size fits all
Dimensions- 2.5cm's high x 14cm's in diameter.

name: MAXI ZARI HEADBAND
description:
This headband has been hand stitched using a traditional Indian trimming. Embroidered with cotton threads, crystals and delicate wire springs. Its lined in a wool felt to prevent slipping and secured to the head with a grosgrain ribbon making it very easy to wear. The ribbon ends have also been hand beaded with glass beads.

Size- One size fits all
Dimensions- 28cm's x 7.5cm's.

name: TEAL & METAL HEXAGON PILLBOX
description:
This hexagonal pillbox has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched.Made from a sturdy buckram base, its then covered in a hand beaded silk chiffon using an assortment of glass beads and brass sequins. Its lined in a contrasting citrine silk and is secured to the head with hidden elastic and a decorative grosgrain ribbon in mustard, making it very easy to wear.

Size- One size fits all
Dimensions- 2.5cm's high, 9cm in diameter.

name: OLIVE AND METAL ZARI HEADBAND
description:
This headband has been hand stitched using a traditional Indian trimming. Embroidered with cotton threads, metal yarns and delicate wire springs. Its lined in a wool felt to prevent slipping and secured to the head with a grosgrain ribbon making it very easy to wear. The ribbon ends have also been hand beaded with glass beads.

30cm's x 6cm's. One size fits all

name: ZIG ZAG BERET
description:
This beret has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched. 

Made from a sturdy buckram base, its been covered in a knitted and felted zig zag patterned lambswool in aubergine and ivory. Lined in an aubergine silk satin and finished with an aubergine grosgrain ribbon to ensure it holds its shape. 

Secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear. The fabric on this hat has been designed and produced by myself so is completely unique.

name: KNITTED HEXAGON PILLBOX
description:
Inspired by middle Eastern patterns, this hexagon shaped pillbox box has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched. 

Made from a sturdy buckram base, its covered in a knitted and felted brocade patterned wool in aubergine and mustard. Lined in a dusty blue silk satin and finished inside with a complimenting grosgrain ribbon.

Secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear.

The fabric on this hat has been designed and produced by myself so is completely unique.

Size- One size fits all
Dimensions- 2.5cm's high, 9cm in diameter.

name: AUBERGINE PERCHER
description:
A completely hand blocked, wired and stitched percher style hat made from a sturdy buckram base and blocked on a vintage hat block.

Covered in an aubergine wool with a black flocked leopard pattern and lined in a leopard print silk satin. 

Secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear.

Size- One size fits all

name: VEILED DEVORE PILLBOX
description:
A completely hand blocked, stitched and wired pillbox hat. Made from a sturdy buckram base its then covered in an aubergine silk devore velvet and finished with a silver trim and silver vintage veiling. 

Lined in a contrasting silk and secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear. 

Dimension/Size-
3cm's high, 11cm's in diameter. One size fits all.

name: ACID TASSEL PILLBOX
description:
Inspired by Middle Eastern cultures, this pillbox has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched. 

Its made from a sturdy buckram base then covered in a vibrant chartreuse silk chiffon, trimmed in a chartreuse silk dupiion binding and topped off with a dip dyed tassel. 

Lined inside with a matching chartreuse silk satin and complementing grosgrain ribbon,and secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear.

Size- One size fits all
Dimensions- 3cm high, 11cm diameter.

name: BLOCK KUFI
description:
A completely hand blocked, wired and stitched kufi. 

Made from a sturdy buckram base, its then covered in a knitted lambswool in pink and aubergine in a dot pattern. Lined in a contrasting silk satin and finished with a grosgrain ribbon to ensure it holds its shape. Finished with a pink leather trim and secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear.

The fabric on this hat has been designed and produced by myself so is completely unique.

Size- 
Made on a 23inch block although as this is a percher, one size fits all.

name: KNITTED POLKADOT BERET
description:
This beret has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched. Made from a sturdy buckram base, its then covered in a knitted and felted polkadot wool in aubergine and hyacinth blue. 

Its lined in a teal silk satin and finished inside with a complimenting grosgrain ribbon.

Secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear. 

The fabric on this hat has been designed and produced by myself so is completely unique.

name: GREEN & MUSTARD WOOL BROCADE BERET
description:
A completely hand blocked, wired and stitched beret made from a sturdy buckram base. 

Covered in a French wool brocade in mustard and green and lined inside in a complementing silk satin and grosgrain ribbon. 

Secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear. 

*This beret was originally designed and made for the show 'Gossip Girl' and has been worn by Leighton Meester in the current U.S series. *

Size- One size fits all
Dimensions- 3cm's high, 18cm's in diameter.

name: BEADED WEB PILLBOX
description:
This pillbox has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched.Made from a sturdy buckram base, its then covered in a hand beaded silk chiffon using glass beads. A black French web lace is then stretched over the top. Its lined in a contrasting magenta silk and is secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear.

Size- One size fits all
Dimensions- 3cm's high, 11cm's in diameter.

name: NAVY PORKPIE WITH LEATHER BAND
description:
A completely hand blocked and hand stitched classic porkpie hat.

Made from a navy blue wool felt and lined inside in a contrasting chartreuse silk satin and matching grosgrain ribbon. 

Trimmed with a super soft lambs leather band in coral pink.

Size- Will fit head size 22-23 inches.

name: RUCHED VELVET HEXAGON PILLBOX
description:
This hexagonal pillbox has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched.Made from a sturdy buckram base, its then covered in a hand manipulated silk velvet in a vibrant orange. Its lined in a contrasting cobalt blue silk and is secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear.

Size- One size fits all
Dimensions- 2.5cm's high, 9cm in diameter.

name: CORAL & MUSTARD KNITTED WOOL BERET
description:
This beret has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched.

Made from a sturdy buckram base, its been covered in a knitted micro checked patterned lambswool in coral and mustard. Lined in a citrine silk satin and finished with a citrine grosgrain ribbon to ensure it holds its shape. Secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear.

The fabric on this hat has been designed and produced by myself so is completely unique.

Size- One size fits all
Dimensions- 3cm's high, 18cm's in diameter.

name: SWEET PILL
description:
This pillbox has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched.Made from a sturdy buckram base, its then covered in a hand beaded tulle using an assortment of beads. Its lined in a complementing silk and is secured to the head with hidden elastic making it very easy to wear.

Size- One size fits all
Dimensions- 3cm high, 11cm diameter.

name: LILAC CHANTILLY HEADPIECE
description:
This headpiece has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched.

Made from a sturdy buckram base, its been covered in a lilac silk crepe and duck egg blue French Chantilly lace. 

Attached to a silk covered alice band in duck egg blue, making it easy to wear.

name: WOODEN FLOWER HEADPIECE
description:
Made from laser cut wood which has taken its design from a Guipure lace pattern.

The wood has been treated with Danish oil to slightly colour it and preserve it.

Secured to a silk covered alice band in sage green, making it very easy to wear.

Size- One size fits all

SOLD OUT

name: POLKADOT HEADPIECE
description:
This headpiece has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched.

Made from a sturdy buckram base, its been covered in a coral pink silk crepe and yellow polkadot tulle.

Attached to a silk covered alice band in yellow, making it very easy to wear.

name: FLOWER POP
description:
This floral head piece has been made from grey French guipure lace which has been completely hand beaded in glass seed and bugle beads in turquoise, yellow and coral. 

Secured to the head with an alice band making it very easy to wear.

name: LACE CRESCENT
description:
This crescent shaped headpiece has been completely hand blocked, wired and stitched.

Made from a sturdy buckram base, its been covered in a coral pink silk crepe and charcoal grey French Chantilly lace. 

Attached to a silk covered alice band in coral pink, making it very easy to wear.

One size fits all
